sen.j: 聖助法親王（せいじょほっしんのう、生没年不詳）は、南北朝時代の法親王。
sen.e: Monk Imperial Prince Seijyo (date of birth and death unknown) was the Monk Imperial Prince in the period of the Southern and Northern Dynasties.

Monk Imperial Prince Seijo (date of birth and death unknown) was the Monk Imperial Prince during the period of the Northern and Southern Courts.

sen.j: 母は正三位菅原在仲の娘少将内侍。
sen.e: His mother is Shosho no naish, the daughter of SUGAWARA no Arinaka, shosanmi (Senior Third Rank).

sen.j: 出家後、京都青蓮院に入り、1335年（建武2年）親王宣下を受けた。
sen.e: He became a priest, and entered into Kyoto Shoren-in Temple; he was announced as the imperial prince in 1335.
